description: The Amazing Grace Centre, founded in 2016, is a community-based organization in Vihiga, Kenya, dedicated to empowering young girls aged 14 to 24. Launched during the COVID-19 pandemic, the initiative focuses on mentoring, education, and economic empowerment through programs in life skills, STEM, agribusiness, and sexual reproductive health. By fostering self-sufficiency and breaking the cycle of poverty, the Centre aims to create confident, independent young women who can achieve their dreams.
name: Amazing Grace Centre
